title: Small inconsistency as to what can be a package name
body:
Packages cannot have a name like "type" or "struct" as the parser
gets confused by the keyword-looking package name. So e.g.
you can't have

 myproject/struct

On the other hand, a package can have those keywords within the fully-qualified package
name, like

myproject/struct/util

as long as the "struct" directory has no source files.
